## TemporalRangesTariff.appliesAt() method

Test if this tariff applies on a given date.

**Signature:**

```typescript
appliesAt(date: Date, utc?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Date | the date to test if this rate applies at |
|  utc | boolean | _(Optional)_ if <code>true</code> then use UTC date components, otherwise assume the local time zone |

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if this tariff applies on the given date
